meanings.definition: A group or association of individuals united by a common interest or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The consociations of bird watchers gathered every weekend to observe different species.
meanings.sent2: The consociations of students working on the science project were highly motivated.
meanings.sent3: The consociations of book lovers decided to start a book club for fun.
meanings.sent4: The consociations of stars in the night sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The consociations of puzzle enthusiasts met regularly to solve challenging puzzles together.

meanings.definition: The act of forming or joining a partnership or alliance.
meanings.sent1: After much discussion, the consociations between the two companies were finalized.
meanings.sent2: The consociations between the countries led to increased trade opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The consociations between the rival teams surprised everyone at the sports event.
meanings.sent4: The consociations between the artists resulted in a stunning collaborative artwork.
meanings.sent5: The consociations between the musicians produced a harmonious melody.
